name: Airbnb
description: Home rental platform that lists properties in Israeli settlements.
reasons: Lists vacation rental properties in illegal Israeli settlements in the occupied West Bank
Reversed its 2018 decision to delist properties in settlements after pressure from pro-Israel groups
Profits from tourism in territories recognized as illegally occupied under international law

alternatives.name: Fairbnb
alternatives.description: Ethical home-sharing platform with community focus

alternatives.name: Vrbo
alternatives.description: Vacation rental platform with less controversial policies

name: Disney
description: Media conglomerate with investments and operations in Israel.
reasons: Major investments in Israeli startup companies
Productions filmed in contested territories

alternatives.name: Independent Films
alternatives.description: Support independent filmmakers and studios

alternatives.description: Curated streaming service featuring global independent cinema

name: Netflix
description: Streaming service with investments in Israeli content and operations.
reasons: Production of shows that normalize occupation

name: TripAdvisor
description: Travel website listing attractions in occupied territories as 'Israel'.
reasons: Lists attractions in occupied territories under Israeli jurisdiction
Normalizes illegal settlements through tourism promotion

alternatives.description: Ethical travel booking platform with transparent policies

alternatives.name: WikiVoyage
alternatives.description: Free, community-driven travel guide with accurate territorial designations
